languages.text: Странные развалины, замеченные с орбиты, похожи на поместье богатого аристократа. Обнаружены остатки защитного купола, площадки шаттлов, домов для слуг и дворца. Определить, что именно произошло, не представляется возможным. Разведка докладывает о жуткой находке в центральном зале. Там у пиршественного стола восседает скелет в остатках дорогой одежды. Стол перед ним усеян золотыми блюдами, на которых лежат останки — явно человеческие. Более нигде в поместье останков людей не обнаружено.

traits.locale_text: Странные развалины, замеченные с орбиты, похожи на поместье богатого аристократа. Обнаружены остатки защитного купола, площадки шаттлов, домов для слуг и дворца. Определить, что именно там произошло, не представляется возможным. Разведка докладывает о жуткой находке в центральном зале. Там у пиршественного стола восседает скелет в остатках дорогой одежды. Стол перед ним усеян золотыми блюдами, на которых лежат останки — явно человеческие. Более нигде в поместье останков людей не обнаружено.

languages.text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.
languages.original_text: Странные развалины, замеченные с орбиты, похожи на поместье богатого аристократа. Обнаружены остатки защитного купола, площадки шаттлов, домов для слуг и дворца. Определить, что именно произошло, не представляется возможным. Разведка докладывает о жуткой находке в центральном зале. Там у пиршественного стола восседает скелет в остатках дорогой одежды. Стол перед ним усеян золотыми блюдами, на которых лежат останки — явно человеческие. Более нигде в поместье останков людей не обнаружено.

traits.locale_text: A bizarre structure observed from orbit turns out to be a ruined estate of a noble family. Further search reveals remains of an envirodome, a landing strip, the main palace and the servants' quarters. It is unclear what exactly has caused the estate to perish. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — a skeleton sits at the dinner table. Gold plates covered with old blood and bones pile up in front of it. There is no doubt the remains on the plates are human. No other remains are found in the estate.

The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — a skeleton sits at the dinner table. Gold plates covered with old blood and bones pile up in front of it. There is no doubt the remains on the plates are human. No other remains are found in the estate.

The bizarre structure observed from orbit turns out to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further search reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and a servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly caused the estate to perish. Moreover, the search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sits at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. There is no doubt the remains on the plates are human. No other remains have been found in the estate.

languages.text: 船员们在轨道上观察到了一座古怪的建筑。这座建筑或许曾是某位富有贵族的庄园，但如今已经变成了一片废墟。船员们进一步搜索之后，在废墟中找到了殖民温室、着陆点、庄园主厅与仆人宿舍区的遗迹。没人知道这里发生了什么事情。搜查小队在庄园主厅看到了令人极其不安的景象——一具衣着华丽的骷髅坐在餐桌旁，桌子上摆放着沾满了血迹的金盘子与成堆的骨头。很显然，盘子里的骨头是人类的骨头。除此之外，在庄园的废墟之内，没有发现其他骸骨。
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.

traits.locale_text: 船员们在轨道上观察到了一座古怪的建筑。这座建筑或许曾是某位富有贵族的庄园，但如今已经变成了一片废墟。船员们进一步搜索之后，在废墟中找到了殖民温室、着陆点、庄园主厅与仆人宿舍区的遗迹。没人知道这里发生了什么事情。搜查小队在庄园主厅看到了令人极其不安的景象——一具衣着华丽的骷髅坐在餐桌旁，桌子上摆放着沾满了血迹的金盘子与成堆的骨头。很显然，盘子里的骨头是人类的骨头。除此之外，在庄园的废墟之内，没有发现其他骸骨。

languages.text: La extraña estructura que la tripulación observa desde la órbita parece ser la mansión en ruinas de un noble acaudalado. Una investigación más exhaustiva revela los restos de una cúpula ambiental, una plataforma de aterrizaje, la mansión principal y los aposentos de los sirvientes. Es imposible determinar lo que ocurrió exactamente. El equipo de búsqueda ha encontrado algo muy inquietante en el salón principal: un esqueleto con ropa lujosa sentado en la mesa. Sobre la mesa hay platos de oro cubiertos de sangre seca y montones de huesos claramente humanos. No se encuentra ningún otro cuerpo en todo el recinto.
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.

traits.locale_text: La extraña estructura que la tripulación observa desde la órbita parece ser la mansión en ruinas de un noble acaudalado. Una investigación más exhaustiva revela los restos de una cúpula ambiental, una plataforma de aterrizaje, la mansión principal y los aposentos de los sirvientes. Es imposible determinar lo que ocurrió exactamente. El equipo de búsqueda ha encontrado algo muy inquietante en el salón principal: un esqueleto con ropa lujosa sentado en la mesa. Sobre la mesa hay platos de oro cubiertos de sangre seca y montones de huesos claramente humanos. No se encuentra ningún otro cuerpo en todo el recinto.

languages.text: 惑星の軌道上から観測された異様な建造物は、かつての裕福な貴族の邸宅と思われる。さらに捜索を進めると、環境ドーム、着陸台、本邸、使用人の宿舎の跡があることがわかった。何が起こったのか正確なことはわからない。そして、調査隊は大広間で実に不穏なものを発見した。豪華な服を着た骸骨が食卓に座っているのだ。テーブルには乾いた血で覆われた金の皿がセットされ、数多の骨が盛り付けられている。皿の上の骨は明らかに人間のものだ。この邸宅では他に遺体は発見されていない。
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.

traits.locale_text: 惑星の軌道上から観測された異様な建造物は、かつての裕福な貴族の邸宅と思われる。さらに捜索を進めると、環境ドーム、着陸台、本邸、使用人の宿舎の跡があることがわかった。何が起こったのか正確なことはわからない。そして、調査隊は大広間で実に不穏なものを発見した。豪華な服を着た骸骨が食卓に座っているのだ。テーブルには乾いた血で覆われた金の皿がセットされ、数多の骨が盛り付けられている。皿の上の骨は明らかに人間のものだ。この邸宅では他に遺体は発見されていない。

languages.text: Das bizarre Gebilde, das aus dem Orbit zu sehen war, ist offenbar das ruinierte Anwesen eines reichen Adligen. Bei einer eingehenden Suche werden die Überreste einer Hab-Kuppel entdeckt, ein Landeplatz, das Haupthaus und die Quartiere der Bediensteten. Es lässt sich nicht sagen, was genau hier vorgefallen ist. In der Haupthalle hat das Suchteam etwas Verstörendes entdeckt: ein opulent gekleidetes Skelett, das am Esstisch sitzt. Der Tisch ist mit goldenen Tellern gedeckt, die voll von altem Blut und alten Knochenhaufen sind. Die Knochen auf den Tellern stammen eindeutig von Menschen. Andere Überreste wurden auf dem gesamten Anwesen nicht entdeckt.
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.

traits.locale_text: Das bizarre Gebilde, das aus dem Orbit zu sehen war, ist offenbar das ruinierte Anwesen eines reichen Adligen. Bei einer eingehenden Suche werden die Überreste einer Hab-Kuppel entdeckt, ein Landeplatz, das Haupthaus und die Quartiere der Bediensteten. Es lässt sich nicht sagen, was genau hier vorgefallen ist. In der Haupthalle hat das Suchteam etwas Verstörendes entdeckt: ein opulent gekleidetes Skelett, das am Esstisch sitzt. Der Tisch ist mit goldenen Tellern gedeckt, die voll von altem Blut und alten Knochenhaufen sind. Die Knochen auf den Tellern stammen eindeutig von Menschen. Andere Überreste wurden auf dem gesamten Anwesen nicht entdeckt.

languages.text: L'étrange structure observée depuis l'orbite semble être les ruines du domaine d'un noble fortuné. Un examen approfondi révèle les restes d'un enviro-dôme, d'une aire d'atterrissage, du manoir principal et des quartiers des serviteurs. Il est impossible de déterminer avec exactitude ce qu'il s'est passé ici. L'équipe de recherche a découverte quelque chose de perturbant dans le hall principal : un squelette richement vêtu assis à une table à manger. La table est dressée d'assiettes en or contenant du sang et des piles d'ossements. Les os dans les assiettes sont clairement humains. Ce sont les seuls restes retrouvés dans l'ensemble du domaine.
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.

Un examen approfondi révèle les restes d'un enviro-dôme, d'une aire d'atterrissage, du manoir principal et des quartiers des serviteurs. Il est impossible de déterminer avec exactitude ce qu'il s'est passé ici. L'équipe de recherche a découverte quelque chose de perturbant dans le hall principal : un squelette richement vêtu assis à une table à manger. La table est dressée d'assiettes en or contenant du sang et des piles d'ossements. Les os dans les assiettes sont clairement humains. Ce sont les seuls restes retrouvés dans l'ensemble du domaine.

languages.text: Yörüngeden gözlemlenen tuhaf yapı, zengin bir soylunun harap hâldeki konağı gibi duruyor. Araştırmaya devam edilince kubbeli meydanın kalıntıları, iniş rampası, ana köşk ve hizmetkârların odaları gözler önüne seriliyor. Burada tam olarak ne yaşandığını çözmenin hiçbir yolu yok. Arama ekibi ana salonda gerçekten de rahatsız edici bir manzarayla karşılaşmış: Şatafatlı bir şekilde giyinmiş bir iskelet yemek masasında oturuyor. Kurulan sofradaki altın tabakların üzeri eskimiş kan ve kemik yığınlarıyla kaplı. Tabaklardaki kemiklerin insan kemiği olduğu bariz. Konakta başka hiçbir cesede rastlanılmadı.
languages.original_text: The bizarre structure observed from orbit appears to be the ruined estate of a wealthy noble. Further searching reveals the remains of an enviro-dome, a landing pad, the main manor, and servants' quarters. It is impossible to determine what exactly happened there. The search team has found something truly disturbing in the main hall — an opulently clothed skeleton sitting at the dinner table. The table is set with gold plates covered with old blood and piles of bones. The bones on the plates are clearly human. No other remains have been found on the estate.
